attrs.name: dimension
attrs.desc: Dimension. By default, the first item in columns is a dimension.

attrs.name: metrics
attrs.desc: Indicator. By default, the second column is an indicator.

attrs.name: dataType
attrs.desc: Data type; The optional values of this attribute are KMB, normal, percent

attrs.name: legendLimit
attrs.desc: The number of displayed legends is limited. If the number of legends is too large, the pie chart style is incorrect. If the number of legends exceeds the maximum value, the legend can be hidden to solve this problem.

attrs.name: selectedMode
attrs.desc: Selected mode; The value of this attribute can be single or multiple
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: hoverAnimation
attrs.desc: Whether to enable the zoom-in animation effect of hovering on a sector
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: digit
attrs.desc: Set the number of bits reserved when the data type is percent.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 2

attrs.name: roseType
attrs.desc: The Nightingale rose chart is displayed. By default, the Nightingale rose chart is not displayed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is radius, area.

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Text label on the pie chart

attrs.name: level
attrs.desc: This parameter is set when there are multiple pie charts.

attrs.name: limitShowNum
attrs.desc: If the value of this parameter exceeds the value of this parameter, replace it with'Other'. In this case, data is displayed in descending order.
